profile.rationale: The job ad focuses on solving business problems using language models (taalmodellen, Azure OpenAI), developing pilots and PoCs, and integrating these solutions into the IT landscape. There's a strong emphasis on both understanding business needs (1.C.1) and the technical development/application of LLMs (1.B.1, 1.B.2). The role also includes delivering production software (1.A.1). This balance of core software engineering tasks with specific GenAI model development and application, without a heavy focus on traditional ML, points to a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the tasks involved, specifically mentioning language models, Azure OpenAI, PoCs, and integration into an IT landscape. The responsibilities align well with the definitions in the coding book, making the analysis straightforward.
